statements: UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 10, price = 50.50 WHERE item_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory SET price = 40.00, item_type = 'Electronics' WHERE item_id = 2;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = quantity + 1, price = price * 1.1 WHERE item_id = 100
UPDATE inventory SET price = price - 5.50, quantity = quantity - 2 WHERE item_name = 'Chair'
UPDATE seeds SET quantity = 100, price = 15.55 WHERE seed_id = 1;
UPDATE tools SET price = 29.99, quantity = 50 WHERE tool_id = 3;
UPDATE seeds SET quantity = quantity + 10, price = price * 1.1 WHERE seed_id = 101;
UPDATE tools SET tool_name = 'Plow Tool', price = 25.99, quantity = quantity - 1 WHERE tool_id = 201;
UPDATE Seeds SET quantity = 100 WHERE seed_id = 1;
UPDATE Fertilizers SET quantity = 50, fertilizer_name = 'SuperGrow' WHERE fertilizer_id = 2;
UPDATE Seeds SET quantity = quantity - 5, seed_name = 'Sunflower Seeds' WHERE seed_id = 101;
UPDATE Fertilizers SET quantity = quantity + 10, fertilizer_name = 'Organic Fertilizer' WHERE fertilizer_id = 201;
UPDATE seeds SET quantity = 50, expiration_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE name = 'Carrot Seeds';
UPDATE inventory SET item_location = 'Warehouse A', item_quantity = 100 WHERE item_name = 'Shovel';
UPDATE seeds SET expiration_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE fertilizers SET quantity = 50, toxicity_level = 'Low' WHERE name = 'Organic Fertilizer';
UPDATE Seeds SET quantity = 20 WHERE seed_id = 3;
